id.description: Unique identifier for the result within the action

meta.description: Abitrary metadata that you may use to describe the result.

type.description: Describes the type of this result. Either 'step', 'join' or 'split'

condition.description: Condition that must evaluate to true in order for this conditional result to be chosen

functions.description: Pre and post functions that execute before and after this result is executed.

transitions.description: Array of step status transitions that this result actions when executed.
